product.name: CP400PB Panel Builder for CP405 and CP408 - <= 2.0.7.05

branches.name: CP400PB Panel Builder for CP405 and CP408

notes.text: The application contains a vulnerability in the file parser of the Text Editor wherein the application doesn’t properly prevent the insertion of specially crafted files.CVE-2018-19008 has been assigned to this vulnerability. A CVSS v3 base score of 7.0 has been calculated; the CVSS vector string is (AV:L/AC:H/PR:N/UI:R/S:U/C:H/I:H/A:H).
notes.title: Vulnerability Summary
